    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String destination,
                 java.lang.String content)
        Sends a message to the given destination. If the destination is the server, MessageType INFO is used. For other Log-MessageTypes use sendLogMessage(String content, MessageType type)
        Parameters:
        destination - - destination of the message
        content - - text of the message

      • registerToServer

        void registerToServer(int port)
        Is called by the Robot Server. Does not need to be called manually.
        Parameters:
        port - - port of the server

      • sendLogMessage

        void sendLogMessage(java.lang.String content,
                    LogLevel logLevel)
        Sends a log message to the server.
        Parameters:
        content - - content of the message
        logLevel - - log level of the message

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns the state of the connection.
        Returns:
        true if connected
